questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Incident/Damage or Missing Report
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.

videos.src: assets/videos/Emco oxisat 2060/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING WALL OUTLET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING WALL OUTLET VOLTAGE

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective

videos.src: assets/videos/Emco oxisat 2060/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING POWER CORD.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING POWER CORD

questions.question: replace the power cord with a new one
check and confirm whether the fuses are blown out
replace the fuses with a new one
check and confirm is there any breakage / damage to the power input pin connector.
replace the power input pin connector with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the pin connector

questions.question: check and confirm whether there is any loose connection or breakage of cable from input pin connector to transformer.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
check and confirm whether the output voltage of transformer is available.
replace the transformer with a new one
check and confirm whether the power supply output is available.
repair / replace the power supply board
check for any loose connections or breakage of cables from power supply board to control board.
reseat or replace the cables accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the SPO2 measurement fails.
check for any loose connection or damage of probe.
replace the probe properly or replace the probe with a new one
check for breakage or damage of probe pin connector
replace the probe pin connector accordingly
check and confirm is there any loose connection or breakage of cable from probe pin connector to control board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display is blank.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for loose connection of cable from display to control board.
reseat the cables properly
replace the display with a new one
check and confirm whether some of the button / buttons do not respond until hard press.
check and confirm is there any loose connection or breakage of cable from keypad to control board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the keypad control accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the Keypad control

questions.question: If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
